name: Wandering Monster: Pluto's Heart
description:
As a defective monster, try to return humanity to the God of Death so that you can prevent the world from going down the toilet in this tough-as-nails adventure game.

Explore a vast, vicious world full of death.
Find items and fight to survive.

Arrow keys move your little monster body.
Shift makes you run.
Z throws a knife. (Useful!)
X swings your axe. (Also useful!)

Try not to die.

Made by Jim and Dean Yockey.
Music by Jim and Dean Yockey.

Read the readme so you can know how to cheat.
Scroll to the bottom of the readme for instructions on how to use the editor.

Contact us at robotsoulsgames@gmail.com
